name: 陳怡倩
objective:
本課程欲提升英文系學生之溝通能力，並著重於簡報部份。中高階英語能力之學生須發表口頭報告，藉此增進有效之語言使用策略。
This course aims to enhance English-major students’ communicative competence with special emphasis on business presentations and meetings. By developing effective skills, strategies and tactful language use, students with high-intermediate proficiency level of English will be able to prepare as well as present verbal reports to achieve career goal.
schedule:
Week 1 2/23 Course introduction
Week 2 3/2   Knowing your audience
Week 3 3/9   Presentation introduction
Week 4 3/16 Structuring
Week 5 3/23 Vocal delivery
Week 6 3/30 Visual aids I
Week 7 4/6   Spring break (no class)
Week 8 4/13 Visual aids II
Week 9 4/20 Mid-term presentations
Week 10 4/27 Visual aids III
Week 11 5/4   Visual aids IV
Week 12 5/11 Visual aids V
Week 13 5/18 Facts & figures
Week 14 5/25 Body language
Week 15 6/1  Q&A sessions & presentation survival techniques
Week 16 6/8  Presenting online I
Week 17 6/15 Presenting online II
Week 18 6/22 Final presentations
scorePolicy: Weekly assignments & in-class activities (45%); mid-term presentation (25%); final presentation (30%)
